meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I sped through my homework to go play outside.
meanings.sent2: The car sped down the highway, leaving a trail of dust behind.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel sped up the tree so fast, it looked like a blur!
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to have sped by as we enjoyed our vacation.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah's incredible speed as it sped across the savannah amazed us all.

meanings.sent1: She ran sped to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent2: The train moved sped through the tunnel, making a loud noise.
meanings.sent3: The wind howled as it sped through the trees, causing the leaves to rustle.
meanings.sent4: The rocket sped towards the moon, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
meanings.sent5: The athlete sped across the finish line, winning the race in record time.

meanings.sent1: I sped up the process by working efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The chef sped up the cooking by using a pressure cooker.
meanings.sent3: The students sped up their studying to finish before the exam.
meanings.sent4: The factory workers sped up production to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The captain sped up the ship to reach the port ahead of schedule.
